text: Project restores degraded forest lands and meets additionality tests per Tool 01.
rule: Project restores degraded forest lands and meets additionality tests per Tool 01.

text: Baseline net GHG removals derived from historical land-use data per Tool 02 guidance.
rule: Baseline net GHG removals derived from historical land-use data per Tool 02 guidance.

text: Project emissions include fossil fuel use, biomass burning, and fertilizer application as per Tool 08.
rule: Project emissions include fossil fuel use, biomass burning, and fertilizer application as per Tool 08.

text: Leakage from activity shifting and market effects addressed using Tool 14 default factors.
rule: Leakage from activity shifting and market effects addressed using Tool 14 default factors.

text: Non-permanence buffer determined via Tool 15 risk analysis and recorded in registry accounts.
rule: Non-permanence buffer determined via Tool 15 risk analysis and recorded in registry accounts.

text: Permanent sample plots re-measured at least every five years per Tool 16 QA/QC guidance.
rule: Permanent sample plots re-measured at least every five years per Tool 16 QA/QC guidance.

text: Sampling uncertainty kept below 10% at 90% confidence or conservatively adjusted using Tool 12.
rule: Sampling uncertainty kept below 10% at 90% confidence or conservatively adjusted using Tool 12.

text: Monitoring reports compile geospatial data, emissions sources, and buffer transactions with full audit trail.
rule: Monitoring reports compile geospatial data, emissions sources, and buffer transactions with full audit trail.

text: Projects reforest lands without forest cover since 1989 and comply with national forest definitions.
rule: Projects reforest lands without forest cover since 1989 and comply with national forest definitions.

text: Baseline biomass estimated using IPCC defaults or site-specific sampling following Tool 02.
rule: Baseline biomass estimated using IPCC defaults or site-specific sampling following Tool 02.

text: Net anthropogenic removals equal project removals minus baseline emissions and leakage.
rule: Net anthropogenic removals equal project removals minus baseline emissions and leakage.

text: Activity shifting leakage quantified annually using Tool 14 and deducted from net removals.
rule: Activity shifting leakage quantified annually using Tool 14 and deducted from net removals.

text: Non-permanence risks addressed through buffer contributions per Tool 15 guidance.
rule: Non-permanence risks addressed through buffer contributions per Tool 15 guidance.

text: Field biomass measurements conducted at least every five years using permanent plots.
rule: Field biomass measurements conducted at least every five years using permanent plots.

text: Sampling uncertainty above 10% addressed with Tool 12 conservative adjustments.
rule: Sampling uncertainty above 10% addressed with Tool 12 conservative adjustments.

text: Monitoring reports consolidate maps, inventory data, leakage deductions, and QA/QC evidence.
rule: Monitoring reports consolidate maps, inventory data, leakage deductions, and QA/QC evidence.

text: Small-scale A/R activities eligible when total area < 16,000 ha and participants grouped as defined.
rule: Small-scale A/R activities eligible when total area < 16,000 ha and participants grouped as defined.

text: Definitions for grouped smallholder projects include participants, monitoring entity, and leakage belt.
rule: Definitions for grouped smallholder projects include participants, monitoring entity, and leakage belt.

text: Project boundary includes above- and below-ground biomass, dead wood, litter, and soil carbon pools unless excluded with justification.
rule: Project boundary includes above- and below-ground biomass, dead wood, litter, and soil carbon pools unless excluded with justification.

text: Baseline scenario assumes continuation of pre-project land use with carbon stock change set to zero.
rule: Baseline scenario assumes continuation of pre-project land use with carbon stock change set to zero.

text: Project removals calculated by summing carbon stock changes per pool minus fossil fuel and fertilizer emissions.
rule: Project removals calculated by summing carbon stock changes per pool minus fossil fuel and fertilizer emissions.

text: Leakage from activity shifting or market effects monitored and deducted using Tool 14 default factors.
rule: Leakage from activity shifting or market effects monitored and deducted using Tool 14 default factors.

text: Monitoring plan requires permanent plots measured every five years plus tracking of grouped participant compliance.
rule: Monitoring plan requires permanent plots measured every five years plus tracking of grouped participant compliance.

text: Data and parameters table specifies default biomass factors and sampling requirements.
rule: Data and parameters table specifies default biomass factors and sampling requirements.

text: Uncertainty calculated per Tool 12; apply deductions when precision exceeds 10%.
rule: Uncertainty calculated per Tool 12; apply deductions when precision exceeds 10%.

text: Non-permanence risk buffer determined via Tool 15 and updated when risk profile changes.
rule: Non-permanence risk buffer determined via Tool 15 and updated when risk profile changes.

text: Normative tools and references (Tools 02, 08, 12, 14, 15, 16) must be accessible to grouped project manager.
rule: Normative tools and references (Tools 02, 08, 12, 14, 15, 16) must be accessible to grouped project manager.

text: Annual net removals computed as sum of pool changes minus leakage and emissions, divided by years between measurements.
rule: Annual net removals computed as sum of pool changes minus leakage and emissions, divided by years between measurements.

text: Annexes include participant enrollment records, training logs, and dispute resolution evidence.
rule: Annexes include participant enrollment records, training logs, and dispute resolution evidence.

text: Wetland restoration projects eligible when activities convert degraded wetlands to forest and meet small-scale thresholds.
rule: Wetland restoration projects eligible when activities convert degraded wetlands to forest and meet small-scale thresholds.

text: Definitions clarify wetland geomorphology, participant aggregation, and leakage belt concepts.
rule: Definitions clarify wetland geomorphology, participant aggregation, and leakage belt concepts.

text: Project boundary includes on-site hydrological interventions and relevant carbon pools except where justified.
rule: Project boundary includes on-site hydrological interventions and relevant carbon pools except where justified.

text: Baseline assumes continuation of pre-project wetland degradation with zero additional removals.
rule: Baseline assumes continuation of pre-project wetland degradation with zero additional removals.

text: Project removals calculated from pool carbon stock changes minus emissions from project operations.
rule: Project removals calculated from pool carbon stock changes minus emissions from project operations.

text: Leakage from displaced wetland uses monitored and deducted using Tool 14 defaults.
rule: Leakage from displaced wetland uses monitored and deducted using Tool 14 defaults.

text: Monitoring plan covers hydrology restoration, vegetation plots, and participant reporting.
rule: Monitoring plan covers hydrology restoration, vegetation plots, and participant reporting.

text: Data tables specify default biomass factors, hydrological parameters, and monitoring records.
rule: Data tables specify default biomass factors, hydrological parameters, and monitoring records.

text: Uncertainty analysis follows Tool 12 with deductions when precision thresholds unmet.
rule: Uncertainty analysis follows Tool 12 with deductions when precision thresholds unmet.

text: Permanence buffer contributions determined via Tool 15 wetland risk factors.
rule: Permanence buffer contributions determined via Tool 15 wetland risk factors.

text: Normative tools and references maintained for monitoring and verification teams.
rule: Normative tools and references maintained for monitoring and verification teams.

text: Annualized carbon stock change derived from difference in pool carbon divided by measurement interval.
rule: Annualized carbon stock change derived from difference in pool carbon divided by measurement interval.

text: Annexes capture hydrology restoration evidence, training records, and community engagement notes.
rule: Annexes capture hydrology restoration evidence, training records, and community engagement notes.
